code: import axios from'axios';var baseUrl='http://localhost:3001';var getAll=function getAll(){var request=axios.get(baseUrl+"/files");return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var getImage=function getImage(filename){var request=axios.get(baseUrl+"/image/"+filename);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};export default{getAll:getAll,getImage:getImage};
